datasheets.name: Arkoth Skorgardt

other.name: Possessed Lord
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

datasheets.fluff: Having braved the horrors of the eightcage, this inveterate murderer has emerged as monstrous in soul as he was in spirit. Arkoth now shares his body with the Bloodthirster Akzharakk, whose might and unquenchable thirst for bloodshed manifest in the Slaughterbound’s mutant form.
datasheets.loadout:
■ Arkoth Skorgardt (1 model)

This model is equipped with: lacerator and daemonic claw.

datasheets.name: Goremongers

other.name: Loping Speed
other.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

datasheets.fluff: Goremongers are mortal cultists obsessed with mechanically augmenting their physical forms into macabre approximations of Khorne’s Bloodletter daemons. Their augmetic limbs propel them across the battlefield at terrifying speed, allowing them to bring their brutal chain weapons to bear before the foe can respond.
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: autopistol; chainblade

datasheets.name: Bloodletters

special.description: Before the battle, at the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, this unit can be split into two units, each containing five models.
special.name: Patrol Squads

datasheets.fluff: Bloodletters are hate and violence made manifest. Attacking in berserk packs or in martial, marching ranks, they hack apart their victims with monstrous hellblades. These weapons glow red-hot with the fury of their wielders, and even the slightest wound they inflict can see the victim bled dry in seconds.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: hellblade.

datasheets.name: Flesh Hounds

other.name: Hunters from the Warp
other.description: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

datasheets.fluff: Khorne’s hunting hounds track their prey’s terror spoor across interstellar gulfs. The brass collars about their necks ward away even the most potent sorceries of their desperate prey before the slavering Flesh Hounds launch themselves onto their victims, swinging vicious talons and sinking foot‑long fangs deep.
datasheets.loadout:
■ The Gore Hound is equipped with: burning roar; gore-drenched fangs.
■ Every Flesh Hound is  equipped with: gore-drenched fangs.

stratagems.name: Rending Strikes
stratagems.target: One SLAUGHTERBOUND or BLOODLETTERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.
stratagems.fluff: Their daemonic essences aflame with murder lust, Khorne’s infernal warriors strike with supernatural violence, hewing apart their foes with terrifying ease.

stratagems.name: Infernal Resilience
stratagems.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more friendly BLOOD LEGIONS units and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.fluff: Fighting alongside Khorne’s infernal legions, these warriors are wreathed in the empyric energies that boil from the forms of their daemonic allies.

stratagems.name: Unrelenting Savagery
stratagems.target: One WORLD EATERS or BLOOD LEGIONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.fluff: Khorne’s warriors will wade through torrents of incoming fire, insensate with rage. Their burning need to sate their anger enables them to shrug off lethal wounds.

enhancements.name: Dread Patron
enhancements.description:
■ Each time the bearer makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
■ The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

enhancements.name: Whirlwind of Blood (Aura)
enhancements.description:
While a friendly WORLD EATERS or BLOOD LEGIONS unit is wholly within 6" of the bearer:

■ Models in that unit have the Stealth ability.
■ Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at that unit.
